title.narrative: Agricultural Development: Multi-energy for Resilience and Integrated Territorial Management Project (MERIT)

description.narrative: The project goal is to contribute to improved food and nutritional security, poverty reduction and strengthened resilience, including climate resilience, for poor rural people in southern Mali. The development objective is sustainable improvement in access to renewable energy and soil. MERIT will strengthen the climate resilience of ecosystems by promoting low-emission energy sources.
